short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What's playing on Triple J NOW

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wanted a quick way to find out what that awesome song is that's playing on Triple J right now? Now you can with literally one click. Mark the song as a favourite so you can view it later. Click on handy links to play each song in Spotify or view it on YouTube. UNOFFICIAL.
